<!-- ## Working Papers -->

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const refsDiv = document.getElementById('refs');
  if (refsDiv) {
    let html = refsDiv.innerHTML;
    if (html.includes('[ABSTRACT-START]')) {
      html = html.replace(/\[ABSTRACT-START\](.*?)\[ABSTRACT-END\]/gs, 
        '<div class="abstract-toggle"><span class="abstract-button">▶ Abstract</span><div class="abstract-content" style="display:none;">$1</div></div>');
      refsDiv.innerHTML = html;
      
      // Add click handlers
      document.querySelectorAll('.abstract-button').forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', function() {
          const content = this.nextElementSibling;
          const isOpen = content.style.display !== 'none';
          
          if (isOpen) {
            content.style.display = 'none';
            this.innerHTML = '▶ Abstract';
          } else {
            content.style.display = 'block';
            this.innerHTML = '▼ Abstract';
          }
        });
      });
    }
  }
});
</script>
